item.description:
Ray is lookingto get a group together to camp at a state park near Hull. Here is his post:

 

Anyone interested in camping at: http://maps.google.com/maps?tab=ml Friday July 22, 23, 24.
More info: http://www.mass.gov/dcr/recreate/camping.htm
It is totally right near Hull and Nantasket Beach

Friday morning will be the advance party, I can take my pick up truck down full of pop tents and what ever gear anyone wants to throw in. I'd like a couple people anyway to commit to Scootering down there Friday morning and meet me to set up pop tents and lay out the campsite.

I'll then drive back home in my pick up truck and scoot down.
A second wave of scooters can come down Friday night after work. Things should be generally set up. We can have a campfire etc... Saturday morning a 3rd wave of scooters can come down, and we're off to Hull and Nantasket Beach.
Saturday night camp fire, Sunday morning, I got get my truck and we break camp. I'd like a $25 commitment which you'll probably get change from on Sunday, and I'd like to see at least 15 scooterists.
item.name: Camp and Scoot
